text: The Great Eastern Railway (GER) was a pre-grouping British railway company. The company's main line linked London Liverpool Street to Norwich and had other lines through East Anglia. The company was grouped into the London and North Eastern Railway in 1923. == Other websites == * Great Eastern Railway Society * Archived copy of a page containing comprehensive details of those railways * Shipping interests of the company * Manningtree Rail Users Association Category:Pre-grouping British railway companies Category:London and North Eastern Railway Category:Transport in Epping Forest Category:1862 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1860s establishments in England Category:1923 disestablishments Category:1920s disestablishments in England
title: Great Eastern Railway
